name: Garuda Prime
description: White, gold and deepest scarlet, the queen of gore in full regalia.

abilities.name: Dread Mirror
abilities.description: Rip the life force from an enemy and use it as a shield that captures damage, this kills significantly weakened enemies instantly. Charge to channel the captured damage into an explosive projectile.

abilities.name: Blood Altar
abilities.description: Impale an enemy on an altar of talons and siphon health for Garuda and her allies.

abilities.name: Bloodletting
abilities.description: Garuda sacrifices her health to generate energy and clear Status Effects.

abilities.name: Seeking Talons
abilities.description: Charge to expand the targeting area, release to send Garuda's talons careening toward each target in area. Surviving enemies are prone to <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status.

languages.description: Weiß, Gold und tiefstes Scharlachrot, die Königin von Blut und Gewalt in vollem Ornat.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Parée de blanc, d'or et d'un écarlate des plus profonds, la reine sanglante se présente dans toute sa gloire.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Bianca, oro e di uno scarlatto profondo, la regina del sangue in tutta la sua gloria.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: 순백과 황금, 그리고 깊은 심홍색의 휘장을 온 몸에 두른 피의 여왕의 모습입니다.
languages.name: 가루다 프라임

languages.description: La reina sanguinaria se viste de gala en blanco, dorado y el más intenso rojo escarlata.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: 纯白、耀金与至深猩红，血腥女王盛装登场。
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Белый, золотой и насыщенно-алый — кровавая королева в полном облачении.
languages.name: Гаруда Прайм

languages.description: 白と黄金、そして深い紅色が虐殺の女王を飾る。
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Biel, złoto i najgłębszy szkarłat, królowa rozlewu krwi w pełnej glorii.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Os tons brancos, dourados e escarlates mais profundos que há, representando a rainha sanguinária por completo.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: 白色、金色，及最深的紅色，血腥女皇，全副盛裝。
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: ราชินีที่อาบไปด้วยเลือดสวมเสื้อผ้าอาภรณ์สุดหรูหราที่ประดับไปด้วยสีขาว สีทอง และสีแดงเข้ม
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Beyaz, altın ve koyu kızıl; kan kraliçesi, kraliyet elbiselerine büründü.
languages.name: Garuda Prime

languages.description: Білий, золотий і найбагряніший — істинні кольори королеви.
languages.name: Ґаруда-прайм
